changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users_roles ( user_id VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users (username), CONSTRAINT fk_role_type FOREIGN KEY (role) REFERENCES role (type), CONSTRAINT unique_user_role UNIQUE (user_id, role) );
